data.text: Naama voloi Deɓola ta Aɓinoame ná-doun zunui Ɓalake ti guyei looni, ti ɠɛ ma:
Izilayɛle, ɛsɛ nɔungi viegɛ, kɛʋele ɓɛtɛ ga é kɔɔi ɠɔ,
Masagiti, à woilo gòo ma! Kundiɠiiti, à woilo!
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, siɛgi zu è Seyiil ɠizei yeini la,
Gizeiti ti ɓusɛni è luɠɔ,
Anate ná-doun zunui Samegaal ná-siɛgi zu,
Ɛsɛ pɛ ge ɠɛlɛni Izilayɛle laa wolaiti ba,
Izilayɛle nuiti ti yiimazeɠeni ga gala kiligiti,
Zìi ɠa zoolɛzu Izilayɛle ɠundiɠiiti ta-vaa zu,
Wɔiti wo lɛɛzu soovale saa ɠolegiti kɔma,
Niiti ti ziɛungiti kobaʋɛ, ti ɗa ziɛi ɠaaɠwɛ,
Wuzeɠe Deɓola, wuzeɠe!
Nui mɔtai zɛgai zobobɛ nuiti su,
Niiti ti pilɛ sɔlɔɔgai Amalɛke ma, naati kulaʋɛ Efelayime.
Isakaal ná-kundiɠiiti ti ɠɛni Deɓola ʋa,
Lee vaa zu è yɛni loni togani makɛsu felegɔi yɔɠɔzu,
Galaade yɛni Zuludɛn ʋoluʋelei.
Zaɓulɔn ɠa ga nuɓusɛi, nii tɛɠɛai saai zu,
Masagiti, ti ziliai ga giye, Kanaan masagiti,
Geeɠɔlɔgi zu, somideɠaiti ti kɔɔi ɠɔɔni,
Ziɛ wolai Kison ti yɛʋɛni, é yei ga tiye,
Sooiti ti leʋeni ga kpizɛi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-geezuɠeelai ɠɛni ma:
Yayɛle ɠa ga tuya nu anzanuiti saama,
Sisela ziɛi valini ma,
É gulu ɠaazoɓagi zoni ga yeei gilagi,
É zeini Yayɛle ɠɔɠɔwu,
Maazuʋɛ, fenɛtɛlɛ laaʋɛ,
É ɠɛni naa wosu nɔ ɠɔ,
«Salaʋusuiti ti kɔɔzoganiiti ka ga bɔɔlɔa,
Ee, Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, è zili nuiti undaaʋili ɠana!
